channel.title: One connection per ip adrees (syi and null stopped!)
channel.description:
OK i dont get the guide in the tutorial section , saying how to do it.. i just finished coding my server, and then someone syipked it, and im soo mad, i fthere is just a copy and paste guide, i have the base of naderpkz, i fully give him credit for that, but i need a simple guide to block syis and nulls!!! thanks and my msn is ccrunner22@live.com maybe you could teamview me??
thanks - wegetmoney :cool: :cool: :cool: :cool:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 03:56:52 pm[/size][hr]still need help!!!!!!!!!!
